message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you take $30.  It's in our best interest to settle this quickly before inflation eats away at the value.
Alice, your offer was a bit unfair. Let's be reasonable - I take 60, you take 40.  This deal benefits us both before inflation hurts us further.
Bob, time is running out!  This is my final offer. Let's be practical, every round costs us money. I'll take $55, you get $45. Deal?
